org.apache.flink.runtime.accumulators

类 AccumulatorRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.accumulators.AccumulatorRegistry

  • public class AccumulatorRegistry
extends Object
    Main accumulator registry which encapsulates internal and user-defined accumulators.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  AccumulatorRegistry.Metric
      Flink metrics supported
      static interface  AccumulatorRegistry.Reporter
      Interface for Flink's internal accumulators.
